sentence.Network_en: The arachnoid is composed of connective tissue devoid of blood vessels.
sentence.Network_cn: 蛛网膜是由无血管的结缔组织所构成.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To explore MRI features of spinal arachnoid cysts.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨椎管内蛛网膜囊肿的MRI表现.

sentence.Network_en: To study the depression of occipital arachnoid granulation by normal CT scans.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过正常颅脑CT扫描图像,对枕骨蛛网膜颗粒压迹进行研究.
